text: How can I add an icon in the form submit button? Is there any way?
<@UADNH3W78> Have you tried using CSS, an icon font and the `::after` pseudo-element?

Hi <@U9WQQAHT5> After you have made your local module, make sure that you have any module in it and that is editable. Like on the old design manager, you have to add modules in it. If you though have modules and the problem still persists, edit the modules in your local module and make sure you haven't enabled 'Prevent editing in content editors'.
<@U7VHQMEV7> Sorry, but I can't really make head and tails of what you are trying to suggest. Are you talking about fields and modules?
<@U9WQQAHT5> yes, have you added any modules under the fields section?
on each module under fields section is a setting 'Prevent editing in content editors', make sure is off.
<@U7VHQMEV7> I'm sure they are simply called Fields not modules but I do have all the fields I need and none of them are prevented from editing
I guess I will simply build the module by hand again
I call them Modules because that's how was called on the old design manager but that is not important. If that's the case then might be a bug that needs reporting.
No worries... just that in my mind it makes more sense to have the custom module simply called "Module" and the data fields - fields

<@U7VHQMEV7> Actually you are right... I already deleted the original module so I can't check that anymore, but the clone I made before that has all the fields marked as "prevent editing" which is weird as I didn't toggle them like that
Does name change toggle that field?
Might be ! I haven't tested that yet.
Thanks for the heads up!
I'll go and toggle them field by field

The new conversations tool is looking nice. Can anyone tell me how to get more people to assign convos to? I only see my name and two other names in the "Assign Conversation Owner"

Also can't figure out how to get people into the rotation.
Seems conversations is only working for Sales Professional. I thought it was announced it was included in Sales Free.

*BUG:* it appears content staging has an issue where the analytics become disconnected. I think this might happen when someone stages a page, then the live page is updated, and then somoene publishes the staged page.
